decision_conditions: The proposed garage, hardstanding and access, by reason of their siting, size and scale, would be harmful to the character and appearance of Mount Park Conservation Area, inconsistent with the pattern of development in the area, and harmful to the appearance of the street scene, contrary to Council's adopted UDP 'New Plan for the Environment' policies 4.1 and 4.8. | The proposed location of the garage, hardstanding and access would be detrimental to the health and appearance of a mature Oak tree of significant public amenity within the Mount Park Conservation Area contrary to Council's adopted UDP 'New Plan for the Environment' policy 4.5.
description: Construction of a ground floor level detached garage in rear garden; hardstanding for car parking; new/ altered vehicle access from Aston Road and automated gates
